doc.field: Lillian F. Robbins certificate from the Regents of the University of the State of New York
Lillian F. Robbins certificate from the Regents of the University of the State of New York

One 1872 certificate issued by the Regents of the University of the State of New York stating that Lillian F. Robbins has passed a proficiency exam administered by the Packer Collegiate Institute in Brooklyn.

One 1872 certificate issued by the Regents of the University of the State of New York stating that Lillian F. Robbins has passed a proficiency exam administered by the Packer Collegiate Institute in Brooklyn.
University of the State of New York

University of the State of New York

One certificate issued by the Regents of the University of the State of New York stating that Lillian F. Robbins has passed a proficiency exam administered by the Packer Collegiate Institute in Brooklyn, and has been registered as an academic scholar at the University. The certificate is dated November 1, 1872.
